item.description: Are you looking to expand your business by networking with local business owners? We are looking for local business pros to refer business to! Printers, Plumbers, wedding planners, electricians, employments services, service pros, etc...Great energy in this group!
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually in the Harvard Room in the Restaurant on the 2nd floor...

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Boston Business Builders
